m_szDocSumamry: Battery-Electric & Fuel-Cell Buses Planned By Daimler For 2018 Originally published on EV Obsession . Daimler Buses will be bringing both the all-electric Citaro E-CELL bus and the hydrogen fuel-cell Citaro F-CELL bus to production standard and “on the roads” by the year 2018, according to a recent press release.
